Draft Rating:

F-

Rich Cho ranks in the 2th percentile for drafting among executives in our database. Cho's draft picks average out to be worth the equivalent of 20 spots lower than they were picked due to their terrible drafting.
Some of their biggest wins:
  • Drafted Kemba Walker with 9th pick but was worth 4th pick.
Some of their biggest busts:
  • Drafted Michael Kidd-Gilchrist with 2th pick but was worth 53th pick.
  • Drafted Cody Zeller with 4th pick but was worth 31th pick.
  • Drafted Jeff Taylor with 31th pick but was worth 40th pick.

Trade Rating:

A+

Rich Cho ranks in the 93th percentile for trading among executives in our database.
Their biggest win:
  • Added Nicolas Batum to CHA.
  • Lost Gerald Henderson, Noah Vonleh to POR.
Their biggest L:
  • Added Corey Maggette, Bismack Biyombo to CHA.
  • Lost Tobias Harris, Stephen Jackson, Shaun Livingston to MIL.

Signing Rating:

A

Rich Cho ranks in the 88th percentile for free agency signings among executives in our database.
Their best signings:
  • Signed Wesley Matthews in 2010.
  • Signed Al Jefferson in 2013.
  • Signed Jannero Pargo in 2013.
Their worst signings:
  • Signed Brendan Haywood in 2012.
  • Signed Cory Higgins in 2011.
  • Signed Gerald Henderson in 2013.
